hero.subTitle: Stay Connected
hero.description: UOK is your daily wellness companion. Check in 2-3 times a day to let your loved ones know you're okay.

feature1.title: Daily Check-Ins
feature1.description: Simple 2-3 minute wellness checks to share your mood and status with loved ones

feature2.title: Smart Insights
feature2.description: AI-powered wellness insights and personalized recommendations based on your check-in patterns

feature3.title: Peace of Mind
feature3.description: Know that your loved ones care about your wellness with instant notifications

feature4.title: Secure & Private
feature4.description: Your data is encrypted and protected. Only share with people you trust

feature5.title: Memory Sharing
feature5.description: Create lasting memories by sharing wellness journeys with your community

feature6.title: Partner Rewards
feature6.description: Unlock exclusive offers from wellness partners when you maintain consistent check-ins

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your account and set up your wellness circle

step2.title: Check In
step2.description: Share your daily mood and wellness status 2-3 times per day

step3.title: Connect
step3.description: Invite loved ones to your wellness circle and get instant updates

step4.title: Thrive
step4.description: Get personalized insights and grow together with your community

testimonial1.text: UOK helps me stay connected with my family. Simple, elegant, and effective.
